title: Israel Asks for a King
summary: In 1 Samuel 8, the Israelites demand a king like the other nations. Samuel warns them that a king will bring hardship, but they insist. God tells Samuel to give them what they ask for.

faq.question: Why did Israel want a king?
faq.answer: They wanted to be like other nations and have someone to lead them into battle.

faq.question: What warning did Samuel give about kings?
faq.answer: That a king would take their sons, daughters, land, and crops for his own purposes.
